body: Welp my name is Ryan..I'm a senior in high school and live in Kansas, U.S. I was surfing through Tinychat and ran into the room with a lot of people in it that played minecraft that happened to be active players here. Now here I am in the TeamSpeak, playing on the server, and surfing the forums.  Feel free to chat me up, down to talk about anything pretty much. Haven't really played Minecraft religiously so I'll be a little lost. Shout out to all the people I met on Tinychat woo
